name: Tanks Vs Tanks (itch)
description:
This is my entry for Kenney Jam 2021 whose theme is Rotation

 This game is defense game akin to Plants vs Zombies in which player deploys units on grids to fend off attacks from red tanks.

Unlike Plants vs Zombies, units can be deployed directly when they are available in HUD on top of the screen.

To fit the theme, available units are rotated from one unit to next one until it repeats from 1st unit and so on. Incoming enemy tanks are also rotated from one tank type to next tank type.

Controls:

NumPad keys = move hand

X = Deploy unit (when selected slot shows available unit)

C= Remove unit

S = Move unit selector left

D= Move unit selector right

Enter = Pause

F8 = Take screenshot

Features:

1. 6 Tank types to deploy

2. 3 obstacle types + 1 land mine to deploy

3. 2 modes: Regular (3 tank slots and 2 obstacles slots) and Tanks (5 tank slots)


Enjoy this fun and challenging game !
